JOBFIND.title: JOBFIND
JOBFIND.description: About how easy would it be for you to find a job with another employer with approximately the same income and fringe benefits you now have? Would you say very easy, somewhat easy, or not easy at all?

JOBFIND1.title: JOBFIND1
JOBFIND1.description: How easy would it be for you to find a job with another employer with approximately the same income and fringe benefits as you have now?
